text: Serie B is the second highest division of Football in Italy. It was founded in 1929. ==Promotion and Relegation== === Promotion === At the end of the seasons, three teams are promoted to Serie A. The first two teams are directly qualified to Lega Pro. The third team is selected by play-offs. If the third team is 10 points or more ahead of the 4th team, then the third team is automatically qualified. === Relegation === The three last-placed teams are directly relegated to Serie C, and the 19th team is automatically relegated only if the 18th team is 5 points or more ahead. If the 18th team is not 5 points or more ahead of the 19th team, there will be play-outs. == Team List == === Seasons in Serie B === * 60 seasons: Brescia * 52 seasons: Verona * 50 seasons: Modena *
